headline: Oracle is a “Decade Stock,” Could More Than Double, Says Analyst
summary: Oracle (NASDAQ:ORCL) has already been punished harshly by the market, thanks to its heavy debt load and OpenAI exposure. That said, the punishment just seems to keep coming for the fast mover in AI data centers. The stock shed another 2.2% on Thursday, sinking below the $170 per-share mark. Undoubtedly, the stock has already lost ... Oracle is a “Decade Stock,” Could More Than Double, Says Analyst

headline: Oracle (ORCL) Remains a Long-term Cloud Computing Story Despite Near-Term Headwinds
summary: Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) is one of the most promising cloud stocks according to analysts. Morgan Stanley, in an update issued on January 23, lowered its target price on Oracle Corporation (NYSE: ORCL) from $320 to $213. The stock is currently trading about 19% below this level. The investment firm is confident that the company will […]

headline: Oracle (ORCL) May Have A Major Problem

headline: AMD stock falls on MI450-series delay rumors
summary: Investing.com -- Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ:AMD) stock declined Friday, falling as much as 6% before paring losses to around 3%, following reports that the company’s next-generation MI450-series AI accelerators might face delays.

raw.headline: AMD stock falls on MI450-series delay rumors

headline: OpenAI Is Planning a Huge IPO. Why Amazon Could Become a Major Investor.
summary: Amazon is in talks to invest up to $50 billion in OpenAI, as part of an overall fund-raising round to raise up to $100 billion, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline: Cloud AI Today - AI Growth Fueled By Cloud Innovation and Demand
summary: The Cloud AI market, specifically within the domain of Artificial Intelligence as a Service (AIaaS), is experiencing robust expansion driven by advancements in cloud infrastructure and the demand for scalable, cost-effective solutions. As organizations increasingly shift to cloud-based AI frameworks, which allow for the outsourcing of AI capabilities without major capital expenditures, there is notable growth driven by the need for quick digital transformation and democratized technology...

headline: Barclays Initiates Bloom Energy (BE) with Equalweight, Sees Growth Priced In
summary: Bloom Energy Corporation (NYSE:BE) is one of the Buzzing AI Stocks on Wall Street. The firm is optimistic on Bloom Energy’s fundamentals but sees growth priced in at current levels. In particular, its solid-oxide fuel cells […]
